paragraph: Teddy Petersen (21 November 1892 – 15 April 1991) was a Danish bandleader and violinist. Formally trained at the conservatory in Copenhagen, Petersen worked with many orchestras, directed the music for many films and recorded approximately 1000 records.
Petersen married Jenny Koefoed on 17 May 1919.
1942 - A Gentleman in Top Hat and Tails
